name: Cold Water (kaidenalessio)
description:
Cold Water is a game where you compete to stay alive while the others freeze in cold water.

The order of the submarines is determined by playing the move card. The number on each move determines position in column (higher number on top, lower number below.) However, ties don't move.

The submarine at the bottom would lose a heart to the freezing cold! This process is repeated until there are no more move cards available.

When there are no more move cards available, or when you are freezing, the top submarine wins the game!
